name: Pudu Lifestyle
overview:
Pudu Lifestyle, an International Men’s Clothing label, which has a huge presence in Australia, has launched for the Indian Market that retails online through http://www.pudulifestyle.com.

Our range of casual clothing for men includes shirts in linen, canvas stretch and prints. The collection also includes pants, lounge pants, cargos and easy to wear shorts.

We are all about the little details that make the big difference. We specialize in casual, current and easy to wear men’s clothing that effortlessly integrates into an existing wardrobe. We like to call our collection “classic with a twist;”, clean lines with great structure to accentuate a man’s body.

All our garments are packed brilliantly and go through a unique 7 stage QC checklist before dispatch to the retail customer. Our Linen collection, which is our biggest seller overseas comes exceptionally packaged in beautifully crafted boxes. The PERFECT gift for a person who appreciates fine quality.”

We believe, we have the right garments that make our customers feel more confident in the way that they look?
